verses.name: Acts 7:10
verses.text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house.

verses.name: Acts 7:11
verses.text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan, and great affliction: and our fathers found no sustenance.

verses.name: Acts 7:12
verses.text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt, he sent out our fathers first.

verses.name: Acts 7:13
verses.text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph’s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.
